option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Base.Theme.SmsAutomationApp" parent="Theme.Material3.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Customize your light theme here. --> <!-- <item name="colorPrimary">@color/my_light_primary</item> -->
<!-- Shape Appearance Overlays --> <item name="materialButtonStyle">@style/Widget.App.CustomButton</item> <item name="materialCardViewStyle">@style/Widget.App.CustomCard</item> </style>
<style name="Theme.SmsAutomationApp" parent="Base.Theme.SmsAutomationApp" />
<!-- Rounded button style --> <style name="Widget.App.CustomButton" parent="@style/Widget.Material3.Button"> <item name="cornerRadius">28dp</item> </style>
<!-- Rounded material card style --> <style name="Widget.App.CustomCard" parent="@style/Widget.Material3.MaterialCardView"> <item name="cardCornerRadius">20dp</item> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme --> <style name="Base.Theme.SmsAutomationApp" parent="Theme.Material3.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <!-- Customize your light theme here --> </style>
<style name="Theme.SmsAutomationApp" parent="Base.Theme.SmsAutomationApp" /> </resources>
